text: Vladimir Tuganov (born 17 July 1961) is a Russian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Russia Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Vladikavkaz
title: Vladimir Tuganov
